channel.title: Version 5.2 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.2.4 (2022-10-02) Fixes [bug] theme: remove HTML5 validator errors #329 5.2.3 (2022-09-12) Fixes [bug] print: chapter planks overwrite font-size #328 5.2.2 (2022-08-23) Fixes [bug] print: fix urls fer uglyURLs=true #322 5.2.1 (2022-08-05) Enhancements [feature] i18n: improve Japanese translat'n #318 Fixes [bug] nav: prev/next ignores ordersectionby #320 Maintenance [task] task: bump Cap'n Hugo minimum requirement t' 0.95 #319 5.2.0 (2022-08-03) Enhancements [feature][change] menu: expand collapsed menus if search term be found 'n submenus #312 Fixes [bug] print: switch mermaid an' swagger style before print #316 [bug] theme: fix chapter margins on big screens #315
